amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the requirement for the conviction of a transferor before a liability action could be taken.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 108-64 to eliminate the requirement under the bill for the conviction of a transferor who knowingly transfers a firearm, knowing that such a firearm will be used to commit a crime of violence before a transferor can be sued.
